text.Prompt:
Conversation:
Matt: Well, I'll see you later, Mrs. Todd. My wife is waiting for me to take her shopping.
Nova: I understand. There's a lot to get done at weekends, especially when you two work and the children are small.
Matt: That's right. Jane and I have been talking about visiting you. So when I saw you in the garden, I decided to come over and say hello.
Nova: I'm glad you did. In fact, I should have called on you first, since you have newly moved here.
Matt: By the way, do you need anything from the store?
Nova: No, but thanks for the offer. And thank you for coming over.
Matt: It's a pleasure.

Now write a summary of the conversation:
text.Response A: The two neighbors, Matt and Nova, are discussing their weekend plans. Matt is going shopping with his wife, while Nova is glad to have finally met her new neighbor. Matt offers to do some grocery shopping for Nova, but she declines. They both express their desire to visit each other sometime soon.
text.Response B: Matt has a busy weekend ahead of him, and he has a wife and children to take care of. He will see Nova later, and they will talk about their future plans.

Nova: I understand. There's a lot to get done at weekends, especially when you two work and the children are small.
Matt: That's right. Jane and I have been talking about visiting you. So when I saw you in the garden, I decided to come over and say hello.

Now write a summary of the conversation:

Response A

The two neighbors, Matt and Nova, are discussing their weekend plans. Matt is going shopping with his wife, while Nova is glad to have finally met her new neighbor. Matt offers to do some grocery shopping for Nova, but she declines. They both express their desire to visit each other sometime soon.

Response B

Matt has a busy weekend ahead of him, and he has a wife and children to take care of. He will see Nova later, and they will talk about their future plans.
